data.name: Gearshifters - Original Soundtrack
data.detailed_description: Take the opportunity to enjoy the music of Gearshifters in a more relaxed context. Each of the nine in-game zones' signature tracks has been tailored specially for this OST, and are supplemented by menu themes as interludes.
data.about_the_game: Take the opportunity to enjoy the music of Gearshifters in a more relaxed context. Each of the nine in-game zones' signature tracks has been tailored specially for this OST, and are supplemented by menu themes as interludes.
data.short_description: The original soundtrack to Gearshifters, arranged for your listening pleasure.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Storage: 73 MB available space
  • Storage (high-quality audio): Additional 350 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: MP3 and 48kHz WAV files included.

data.legal_notice: © 2021 Red Phantom Games Limited. All rights reserved. "Gearshifters" is a trademark of Red Phantom Games Limited. Music by Guy Cockcroft / Red Button Audio.
